price: 31. Išskyrus Iblis (Šėtoną) – jis atsisakė būti tarp sukniubusiųjų.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
